title: How to sell a music video or even give a music video to a good artist - Quora

response.answer_text: There are many different styles of music video, just as there are as many different types of music. There are several people selling various types of music video on Fiverr. Anything from audio visualizers, lyric videos, and animations, to “I will dance to any song” more agro offerings. Like any product, you just need to find someone who wants your type of video. Try Fiverr, you can offer in the Craigslist / community / musicians section. If you're offering it for frre, expect many flakey people to avail themselves of your generosity. Good luck, and have fun with it!
